title: Mobile Context-Based English Learning Program: Focused on Real-World Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and fundamental smartphone usage abilities
context.additional_context: Aims to Strengthen English Utilization Skills in Real-Life Contexts, Conducting Learning Activities in Actual Campus and Off-Campus Environments

learning_goals: Learners can communicate using over 10 core English expressions in daily life/travel/business contexts
Learners can design three or more personalized learning scenarios based on real-world situational data collected via mobile apps
Learners can produce role-play performance videos lasting 15+ minutes in authentic environments through project evaluations
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
